meanings.definition: A conceited, foolish, or foppish person.
meanings.sent1: The coxcomb strutted around, thinking he was better than everyone else.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a coxcomb and show off your new clothes all the time.
meanings.sent3: The coxcomb's vanity was so extreme that he even admired his own shadow.
meanings.sent4: His coxcomb behavior made him the laughingstock of the town.
meanings.sent5: The coxcomb's arrogance was as bright as a neon sign, impossible to miss.

meanings.definition: A cap worn by court jesters, typically decorated with a strip of red.
meanings.sent1: The jester's coxcomb added a playful touch to his outfit.
meanings.sent2: The coxcomb was adorned with a vibrant red feather, catching everyone's eye.
meanings.sent3: The coxcomb sat jauntily atop the jester's head, adding to his comedic appearance.
meanings.sent4: The coxcomb seemed to dance with each step the jester took, bringing smiles to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The jester's coxcomb was like a cherry on top of his hilarious performance.
